subtasks.subtask: Pick up the white cup from the left side of the table.
subtasks.subtask_reason: The white cup is currently upside down and needs to be moved to the center of the table for flipping.
subtasks.move: move to the left and pick the white cup.
subtasks.move_reason: This movement is necessary to reach the white cup before flipping it.
subtasks.issue: The white cup might be difficult to grasp due to its size and position.
subtasks.solution: Ensure a firm grip on the cup to prevent it from slipping during the pick-up process.

subtasks.subtask: Move the white cup to the center of the table.
subtasks.subtask_reason: The white cup needs to be positioned centrally for flipping.
subtasks.move: move to the center and place the white cup upright.
subtasks.move_reason: This movement is necessary to place the cup in the desired location for flipping.
subtasks.issue: The white cup might not be stable when flipped.
subtasks.solution: Ensure the cup is securely placed on the table before flipping it to avoid any tipping over.

subtasks.subtask_reason: The cup needs to be flipped to match the orientation of the other cups.
